definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
to follow/to adhere to/to abide by

sentences.english: The tribunal shall decide on the basis of respect for the law.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁庭依循法律规定作出裁判。

sentences.english: Everything grows because of the moon. Everything ripens because of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 万物依循著月亮而成长，并依著太阳而成熟。

sentences.english: Today we shall talk about how to end dukkha (suffering) according to Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们要来谈谈如何依循佛法来灭苦。

sentences.english: Are you tired of waiting for God, of following his time schedule?
sentences.chinese: 你对等候神或要依循祂作事的时间表，感到不耐烦吗？

sentences.english: It didn't follow the rules anymore.
With this pace, you are building up momentum in spreading the light and love.
sentences.chinese: 依循这个步调你们散布的光与爱正建造了势头。

sentences.english: Is there any way or rules to adhere to when governing a country?
sentences.chinese: 治国理家有什么方法或规则可依循的么？

sentences.english: The nations they conquered were enslaved a practice justified by their religion.
sentences.chinese: 他们依循着他们宗教的教义，奴役被征服的民族。

definition: to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
to adopt (a system, policy, strategy etc)
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
